name: Frilly Dress (Size 4) One Of A Kind
description:
What a perfect dress for twirling in!

With frills and and a bow any little girl will love to wear this dress. This dress is made from 100% cotton fabric, and the chocolate and light blue colour scheme is very modern. This is a one-of-a-kind dress, as I no more of these fabrics left.

The top does up with two ties on each shoulder. This dress has a wide waist which makes dressing easy, and the bow gathers the dress in for a fitted look. Both of these features mean that this dress will last a long time because you can make small adjustments as your girl grows.

Add tights and a shirt for a warmer outfit, or wear by itself for a fun summer dress.

All seams are finished and reinforced so this dress will last through hours of play and many washes. (Machine washable)

This dress will fit a girl who is 4 years old (European size 104)
Chest: 62cm (24.5")
Length: 58cm (23")


All prices are in Australian dollars

name: The Mia Dress - Purple Butterflies (Size 2)
description:
This dress is a lovely mix of girly ruffles and funky fabric.

This dress features a high waisted bodice of purple butterflies on a white background, a gathered skirt of dark purple poplin and a ruffle of the butterfly fabric at the bottom. This dress is made from 100% cotton fabric. The bodice is lined and does up with three buttons along the back.

Add tights and a shirt for a warmer outfit, or wear it by itself for a fun summer dress.

All seams are finished and reinforced so this dress will last through hours of play and many washes. (Machine washable)

This will fit a girl of 2 or 3 years of age 
Chest: 57cm (22")
Length: 60 cm (23.5")
Shoulder to bottom hem

 
Prices are in Australian Dollars
